title: ‘If I Want to Return as a Cyclist, It’s Now or Never’: Anna van der Breggen Stuns with Comeback Announcement
content:
Past Olympic and world champion to return after three years: ‘Do I still want to be a winner? I always want to win.’

Read the full article at ‘If I Want to Return as a Cyclist, It’s Now or Never’: Anna van der Breggen Stuns with Comeback Announcement on Velo.
author: sstokes
